#Create Df - DataFame oluştur
UrunIdList=[1263,3636,24,1596]
UrunAnalysisDf=pd.DataFrame()
for i in UrunIdList:
    df = pd.DataFrame()
    x = random.randint(1000, size=(7))
    df["SalesCount"]=x
    df['Date'] = pd.date_range('2021-10-04', periods=7, freq='D')
    df["WeekofDay"]=df["Date"].apply(lambda x:x.isoweekday())
    df["UrunId"]=i
    UrunAnalysisDf=UrunAnalysisDf.append(df,ignore_index=True)

Alldf=pd.DataFrame()
for i in UrunAnalysisDf.UrunId.unique():
    kucukdf=UrunAnalysisDf.loc[UrunAnalysisDf.UrunId==i,:].reset_index(drop=True)
    kucukdf["IncDesc"]=kucukdf["SalesCount"].pct_change() *100
    if pd.isnull(kucukdf.loc[0,"IncDesc"]):
        maxindex=kucukdf.index.max()
        briindi=kucukdf.loc[maxindex,"SalesCount"]
        ikinci=kucukdf.loc[0,"SalesCount"]
        hesaplamasi=((ikinci-briindi) / briindi) *100
        kucukdf.loc[0,"IncDesc"]=hesaplamasi
    Alldf=Alldf.append(kucukdf,ignore_index=True)
Alldf

def SingleLineChart(df,xcolumn,ycolumn,title):
    fig = px.line(df, x=xcolumn, y=ycolumn,
                  title=title)
    fig.show()
for i in UrunIdList:
    df=Alldf.loc[Alldf.UrunId==i,:]
    SingleLineChart(df,"WeekofDay","SalesCount",str(i)+"--"+"Sales Count")
